data.name: Es Cendol
data.description: An iced sweet dessert drink with green rice flour jelly, coconut milk, and palm sugar syrup.

data.name: Es Campur
data.description: A mixed ice dessert made with various ingredients like fruits, jelly, coconut, and sweet syrups.

data.name: Bajigur
data.description: A warm, sweet drink made from coconut milk, palm sugar, and spices, often enjoyed on rainy days.

data.name: Wedang Jahe
data.description: A traditional ginger tea made with boiled ginger, palm sugar, and pandan leaves.

data.name: Kopi Tubruk
data.description: A simple coffee preparation where finely ground coffee is boiled with sugar.

data.name: Es Doger
data.description: A sweet, pink-colored drink made with coconut milk, fermented cassava, and sweet syrup.

data.name: Sekoteng
data.description: A warm, spiced drink made with ginger, peanuts, and other toppings, often sold by street vendors.

data.name: Bandrek
data.description: A traditional spiced beverage made from ginger and palm sugar, perfect for warming up on cold days.

data.name: Es Teler
data.description: A refreshing drink with young coconut, avocado, jackfruit, and condensed milk, often topped with ice.
